data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ythier, Eric, Lourenco, Wilson R. (2017): The geographical patterns of distribution of the genus Teuthraustes Simon, 1878 in Ecuador and description of three new species (Scorpiones, Chactidae). ZooKeys 721: 45-63, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.721.21529, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.721.21529
